summary: A TensorFlow implementation of a Retrieval‑Augmented Generation (RAG) model that combines a dense retriever with a generative decoder to produce context‑aware text outputs.
business_intent: Provides a ready‑to‑use TF‑based solution for question answering, knowledge‑base chatbots, and other document‑grounded generation tasks, enabling developers to integrate retrieval‑augmented language generation into their applications.
